abstract: Maynor Alexis Figueroa Róchez (born 2 May 1983) is a Honduran professional footballer who plays as a centre back or left back for Premier League side Hull City and the Honduras national football team. He has made 100 international appearances since 2003, including at three CONCACAF Gold Cups, the 2010 World Cup and the 2012 Olympics.
